job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Blue Rose is currently seeking someone with the skills to help us improve the publicfacing systems of a federal client Specifically you will implement a new chatbot product to enhance customer experience and reduce operational costs by using conversational AI technology  natural language processing NLP and other cognitive APIs You will develop train and evaluate natural language processing NLP models for the deployed Conversational AI PlatformbrbrThe successful candidate willbrulliuse statistical analysis and programming to analyze and interpret language datasets liliprovide expertise in AI services including Natural Language Processing and ML architecturelilianalyze training and test data to help fine tune semantic models to improve overall accuracy and performancelilidevelop supervised and unsupervised learning models to provide actionable insights for business requirementsbrliulstrongRequirementsbrstrongulliMust be US CitizenliliExperienced in Machine Learning concepts and algorithms Python 3X ScikitLearn Natural Language Tool Kit and SQL Relational or NoSQLliliPreferred experience with backend web development Java MongoDynamoDB NodeJS and RESTful ArchitecturebrliulThe salary for this position is 110000  130000 annuallybrbrPowered by JazzHRbrbrQNXetDeDtQ
